activities: The GRM ECM system VisualVault, can be used to store information for documents.  The user of the system has the ability to store any metadata about a document or content.  It is at the users discretion to decide on storing personal information or not.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Any personal data collected is provided by the customer using the system.  The customer must fully authorize GRM to perform the data collection.  All data collected is monitored by internal audit trails in the application.
privacyprograms: GRM Maintains third party certification in SOC-2, HIPAA HITECH, SEC-17A, PCI and ISO 200773
